column1: iheed Medical Education for Healthcare Professionals (PGCert / PGDip / MSc)
column5: The new Certificate, Postgraduate Diploma and Masters in Medical Education for Healthcare Professionals is designed as an international programme for healthcare professionals across the globe who wish to work with leading experts to enhance their roles as clinical or academic teachers. Run byÂ iheed, the courses are accredited by the University of Warwick.
column9: PGCert: 6 months; PGDip: 12 months; MSc: 22 months
